settings.title: VIP Club - Save On Every Order!

settings.text:
Join the VIP Club for $69 and enjoy tiered discounts based on your total order purchase price for the entire year. Members also receive additional exclusive deals and discounts via our rewards program. VIP Club automatically renews each year on 4/1. Order as often as you would like.

The sooner you join, the more you save. Subscribe for automatic annual VIP Club Membership renewal automatically and received $10.00 off your annual membership cost (i.e., $59.99), unless you cancel before then. It's easy to manage your VIP membership through your Crab Place account.

settings.title: $20.00 Discount
settings.text: All orders between $0.00 - 74.99 total product purchase, excluding shipping cost.

settings.title: $22.50 Discount
settings.text: All orders between $75.00 - 149.99 total product purchase, excluding shipping cost.

settings.title: $25.00 Discount
settings.text: All orders between $150.00+ total product purchase, excluding shipping cost.

The Perks of being a VIP Club Member

VIP Club members earn points on each product purchase. VIP members will also receive exclusive deals and discounts not offered on our web site or to regular newsletter subscribers. You will receive periodic email announcements containing super deals available only to our elite VIP's.

How to sign up

Simple add the VIP Club Membership to your cart after you create an account.
